Text: RE New Folder to be set upPST Will be completed by takes a while to copy these Reminder you will have to copy the data into that folder structure that you want to take with you thanks spc Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday February PM To Cox Paige Subject RE New Folder to be set up Thanks Will this folder be set up today John Original Message From Cox Paige Sent Wednesday February AM To Griffith John Subject RE New Folder to be set up John On the O drive you will not be allowed to create folders as this is a common drive so all folders are created by IT it was this way at Enron The exception to this rule is if you are the owner of the main folder which in this case you are So to make a long story short YOU will be able to create folders under this path that we have requested but your team members wont They will have to request access to do so Again its the same process as we used at Enron thank spc Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday February AM To Cox Paige Subject RE New Folder to be set up Thanks I have a question Paige will I be able to create folders under this folder If not then I need to send another request in John Original Message From Cox Paige Sent Wednesday February AM To Griffith John Subject RE New Folder to be set up John I have escalated Paige Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday February AM To UBSW Energy Storage Security Cc Cox Paige Quigley Dutch Subject New Folder to be set up I need to have a new folder set up under the new O drive it is as follows OFinancialTrading I should be listed as owner Also please give the following people read and write access to these folders Mike Maggi John Lavarato Dutch Quigley Larry May Jeb Ligums Andy Zipper Thanks for you help I need these set up as soon as possible Please call with any questions or concerns John Griffith

RE New Folder to be set upPST John On the O drive you will not be allowed to create folders as this is a common drive so all folders are created by IT it was this way at Enron The exception to this rule is if you are the owner of the main folder which in this case you are So to make a long story short YOU will be able to create folders under this path that we have requested but your team members wont They will have to request access to do so Again its the same process as we used at Enron thank spc Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday February AM To Cox Paige Subject RE New Folder to be set up Thanks I have a question Paige will I be able to create folders under this folder If not then I need to send another request in John Original Message From Cox Paige Sent Wednesday February AM To Griffith John Subject RE New Folder to be set up John I have escalated Paige Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday February AM To UBSW Energy Storage Security Cc Cox Paige Quigley Dutch Subject New Folder to be set up I need to have a new folder set up under the new O drive it is as follows OFinancialTrading I should be listed as owner Also please give the following people read and write access to these folders Mike Maggi John Lavarato Dutch Quigley Larry May Jeb Ligums Andy Zipper Thanks for you help I need these set up as soon as possible Please call with any questions or concerns John Griffith

RE New Folder to be set upPST John I have escalated Paige Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday February AM To UBSW Energy Storage Security Cc Cox Paige Quigley Dutch Subject New Folder to be set up I need to have a new folder set up under the new O drive it is as follows OFinancialTrading I should be listed as owner Also please give the following people read and write access to these folders Mike Maggi John Lavarato Dutch Quigley Larry May Jeb Ligums Andy Zipper Thanks for you help I need these set up as soon as possible Please call with any questions or concerns John Griffith

RE Laptop Cc Therese Thank you for always remembering to keep us in the loop We really appreciate it spc Original Message From Candella Therese Sent Thursday January AM To Langston Joe Cox Paige Cc Moore Kevin G Crenshaw Shirley Dupont Anita Kaminski Vince J Subject RE Laptop Joe Just a little note Since the Research Group will be gone on Jan I want to make sure that you know that the Research Group Laptop asset tag that was returned to me will managed by Kevin Moore as of today Kevin will be the only remaining employee from this group If there is anymore information needed pertaining to this please feel free to contact me at x Original Message From Candella Therese Sent Wednesday January PM To Langston Joe Subject RE Laptop Thanks Joe Therese Original Message From Langston Joe Sent Tuesday January AM To Candella Therese Subject Laptop Theresa I returned the laptop labelled Research to the cubicle right outside of I was told that the person who sits there is not in today so I wanted to let you know what has been done with it Joe Langston x

FW Estate logins Cc PST All In anticipation of the UBSWE migration Tom May has requested that Estate accounts be set up for you so that you may continue to work on the Estate contracts even after youve been migrated actual migration date TBD at this point Please take time this afternoon to log in with the IDs and password given below it will force you to change your password after the first login Once logged in please test your applications etc to ensure that youll be able to work in the Estate environment We dont anticipate any issue as these are replicas of your current Enron accounts Please contact me immediately should you have an issue Finally please send a note to Tom May and me after youve tested and well consider your email a sign off that you are able to work in the Estate environment Please note that these accounts will be disabled on Day also TBD of UBSWE thank you in advance for your assistance S Paige Cox Director Global Infrastructure Enron Net Works office cell Original Message From Van Arsdall Leah Sent Monday February PM To Cox Paige Subject RE Estate logins Yes Please see ids below The initial password for all ids is scuru Cara Semperger estcsemper Donald Robinson estdrobins Diane Cutsforth estdcutsfor Corry Bentley estcbentle Jason Choate estjchoate Lisa Burnett estlburnett Pat Hanse estphanse Thanks Leah

RE Cc Hi Jennifer There was some discussion of this but I havent agreed to pay for the damage as it was caused by a rd party contractor When I was at the house I mentioned the damage to company thats responsible and told them that wed follow up for reparations If youll forward the invoice a copy will be fine Ill try and run this down and see that its taken care of Please send via interoffice Im at EB Thanks Paige Original Message From Burns Jennifer Sent Tuesday October PM To Cox Paige Cc Evans Carolyn Shankman Jeffrey A Subject Importance High Paige Some time ago Jeff had some wiring done at his home for use of his company laptop As you may recall there were some problems where the wiring was placed the first time and Jeff had to have his contractor come out and do repairs We had discussed your group reimbursing or paying for the repairs and the invoice has made it to my desk today Please let me know how you would like to proceed with this Thanks Jennifer Jennifer Burns Executive Assistant to Jeff Shankman Enron Global Markets LLC

UBSW Energy Data and Email Migration rules and responsibilitiesPST You have been chosen to represent your groups at this meeting for an overview of the Roles and Responsibilities for Data and Email migration to UBSWE Infrastructure will need your assistance in getting the word out to your teams and ensuring that everyone complies with the legal and IT requirements Every user will be required to ownership of their files and emails that meet compliance and need to migrate to our new company IT will send out a communication to everyone but I want to give you a blow by blow explanation before the communication goes out If you are unable to attend this meeting please send someone as your proxy Simon it would help if you were on hand to assist with any technical questions that may arise for which I dont have an answer

FW MCommonpower folder Cc PST Security FYI Stacey Ive redirected to proper email address thanks spc Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Wednesday February PM To Deleon Roberto Cc Zheng Min Lee Norman Cox Paige Subject FW MCommonpower folder Roberto Can you please add to the m drive a first tier directory of common Please let me know ASAP that this is complete Thanks Stacey White Director Power Risk Management Original Message From Zheng Min Sent Wednesday February PM To White Stacey W Evans Casey Postlethwaite John Reeves Kathy Cc Lee Norman Subject RE MCommonpower folder Dear Stacey The person should be in Roberto Deleon term X Thanks Min Zheng Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Wednesday February PM To Zheng Min Evans Casey Postlethwaite John Reeves Kathy Cc Lee Norman Subject RE MCommonpower folder Who do we ask to set up the mcommon This makes the most sense to me Stacey Original Message From Zheng Min Sent Wednesday February PM To White Stacey W Evans Casey Postlethwaite John Reeves Kathy Cc Lee Norman Subject MCommonpower folder Importance High Dear All In Enron system Mcommonpower is one of our major folder In UBS system it is changed to Mpower I wonder whether we need to create a new folder Mcommon then move Mpower under Mcommon and become Mcommonpower just as Enron system Otherwise we at least need to spent a lot of time to find out and change all path pointers and fixed links of Excel application under power folder Also if too many files dynamic links are messed up we may be able to ask system team to rebuild power folder for us Thanks Min Zheng

UBSW Energy Data and Email Migration rules and responsibilitiesPST When Friday February AM AM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ECS You have been chosen to represent your groups at this meeting for an overview of the Roles and Responsibilities for Data and Email migration to UBSWE Infrastructure will need your assistance in getting the word out to your teams and ensuring that everyone complies with the legal and IT requirements Every user will be required to ownership of their files and emails that meet compliance and need to migrate to our new company IT will send out a communication to everyone but I want to give you a blow by blow explanation before the communication goes out If you are unable to attend this meeting please send someone as your proxy Simon it would help if you were on hand to assist with any technical questions that may arise for which I dont have an answer

UPDATE PLEASE READ UBSWE Migration Cc PST Thank you for attending or sending a proxy too the UBSWE migration meeting this morning Wanted to update you with some late breaking news Legal will not have their compliance policy completed by close of business today therefore we cannot publish all of the information that we covered in the meeting therefore we arent going to migrate anyone on Sunday night as I had previously stated So we have a little reprieve There is a possibility that we will migrate everyone Monday night I will communicate as soon as I hear a definite answer We will continue to work through the issuespoints you raised today thank you by the way I do need your assistance on one thing if you know of people that are gong to UBS but will have to work to support Estate contracts next week outside of the schedulers I already have their names down could you send me a list of their names Much thanks and have a great Super Bowl weekend stay tuned for more S Paige Cox Director Global Infrastructure Enron Net Works office cell
